Package SimulationData

Class SimulationData

java.lang.Object
SimulationData.SimulationData
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimulationDataInterface
public class SimulationData extends Object implements SimulationDataInterface
SimulationData.java This class manages the simulation data, including parsing command line arguments, generating cost matrices, and accessing various simulation parameters. Created on 01/06/2024
Since:
1.0
See Also:
  • ExponentialDistribution
